title: An Act establishing a commission regarding the privacy of sensitive information in legal documents

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Scanlon of North Attleborough, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 1988) of Adam J. Scanlon for an investigation by a special commission (including members of the General Court) relative to the privacy of sensitive information in legal documents.  The Judiciary.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on The Judiciary
Hearing scheduled for 11/04/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-1
